definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: strike (Aram. [[מְחָא]] (II), mh.o0; acc. to L Gei:Urspr. d. spr. 416 Lag:Sem. i. 26, BN 142 Nö:ZMG xxxii, 1878, 409 weakend fr. mh.a9 = mxd., Heb. [[מָחַץ]] q.v. cf. Dr:§ 178 n.; As maḫû = crush, oppress, acc. to Dl:HWB 396);—Pf. 3 ms. consec., [[וּמָחָה]] ´[[עַל־כֶּתֶף וגו]] Nu 34:11 (P) and the border shall strike upon (reach unto) the shoulder of the sea of Chinnereth ( > Di al. der. fr. I. [[מָחָה]] rub along by, brush past, skirt).
